title: Aarya Diamond Studded Floral Earrings - Stunning Vintara Kammalu
materials: 22K Yellow Gold with meticulously set Brilliant Cut Diamonds. Features a delicate Hyderabadi Polish for lasting luster. Gross weight 7.980 grams; Net Weight: 7.780 grams.
features: These earrings showcase a floral design, with diamonds pav√© set around a central cluster for maximum sparkle. The intricate gold filigree work adds to the vintage charm, making them reminiscent of traditional South Indian Kammalu designs, blending traditional floral motifs with modern diamond settings. Each diamond is hand-selected and precisely placed.
colors: Dominant color is warm yellow-gold complemented by the brilliant white sparkle of the diamonds. A classic and elegant color combination.
occasions: Perfect for both traditional Telugu events like weddings (pelliki)
and elegant evening wear. Suitable for brides looking for a touch of heritage in their modern ensembles.
description: These earrings perfectly balance traditional design with modern diamond brilliance. The use of 22K gold ensures long-lasting value and shine. The intricate craftsmanship reflects the rich jewelry-making heritage of Hyderabad. A truly unique piece that combines heritage with modern style. Excellent diamond clarity provides exceptional brilliance.
